message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the use of Restricted Boltzmann Machines (RBMs) in recommender systems, which is a common topic in the machine learning community. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with the cold start problem, which is a common issue in information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper discusses the combination of content and collaborative data, which is a topic in social and information networks (cs.SI) and natural language processing (cs.CL).
